ygData.subject: Re: General information about Kerra Island
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Certainly on the males/females/huntresses/pridesmen/clawnights there isn t much interesting except the rare gem or copper band.  There was this black
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Schafer, Timothy L 1425" <Timothy.Schafer@...>
>
>I can pretty much guarantee one of two things.
>
>1. There is nothing magical or worth platinum on the island.

Certainly on the males/females/huntresses/pridesmen/clawnights there isn't
much interesting except the rare
gem or copper band. There was this black collar thing I got and I sold it
for maybe 7 gold but thats about it.

I adventured there for a few levels and its good exp for level 5/6/7. I
actually stayed there till I was level 9 or so I think. The problem is
that you need a group because they train alot.

Maybe check out the kerra island invasion websites and see that they say
about the topic.

Azboklin
